title: brahma visNu mahEswara
sahitya:
brahma vishNu mahEshwara hamsanE 
immaiyilum maRumaiyilum ummai maRavEn 
(brahma)

anupallavi

kanma vinai kaLaiyum tiruvuruvE 
cinmayanE shiva shankara satguruvE 
(brahma)

caraNam

tanaittAn uNarum tattuva bhOdanE 
unaidhyAnam seyda uLmanam teLivurumE 
kanakAngi annai kAmAkshiyin 
iNaitAL tuNai ena tudittOr tuyar tIrkkum 
(brahma)
